alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 3:43PM CDT until May 11 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Northeastern Logan County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Northwestern Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 343 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Grinnell, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 65 mph winds near Oakley. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oakley around 355 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 68 and 86. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
